name: Indian Flying Academy
about: Indian Flying Academy is a premier flight training institution, dedicated to producing professional and safety-conscious pilots. With partnerships with global flight schools, we offer comprehensive training programs under FAA, EASA, and DGCA regulations. Our experienced instructors provide personalized training, and our state-of-the-art facilities include single-engine and multi-engine aircraft. We ensure a safe and innovative learning environment, preparing students for careers as airline pilots or corporate aviators. Our commitment to customer satisfaction and continuous innovation makes us a trusted name in aviation training. Join us to embark on a journey to become a confident and professional pilot.
services:
["COMMERCIAL PILOT'S LISENCE
Foreign License Conversion
Ground Classes
Simulator Training"]
